channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Catholics across the U.S. grieve, pray and reflect on the pope's legacy
Do you have memories of Pope Francis to share? Send them our way
item.description: Pope Francis, one of the most popular popes in decades, has died. As the world mourns and reflects on his legacy, NPR would like to hear your stories.

item.title: What happens next after a pope dies, according to recent history
item.description: The last pope to die during his tenure was Pope John Paul II in 2005. Here's what happened in the days and weeks that followed.

item.title: Exclusive: The White House is looking to replace Pete Hegseth as defense secretary
item.description: The White House has begun the process of looking for a new secretary of defense, according to a U.S. official who was not authorized to speak publicly...

item.title: Pope Francis is remembered around the world for his generosity of spirit
item.description: The pope's death at the age of 88 ends a 12-year papacy that began with the historic resignation of Francis' predecessor in 2013.

item.title: Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
item.description: An Associated Press analysis of an aviation safety database reveals that drones last year accounted for nearly two-thirds of reported near midair coll...

item.title: 60,000 Americans to lose their rental assistance and risk eviction unless Congress acts
Passengers evacuate Delta plane after engine fire
item.description: Almost 300 people were on board the flight that was scheduled from Orlando to Atlanta, the airline said.

item.title: Kristi Noem's bag stolen with multiple forms of ID, thousands in cash
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem's driver's license, passport, DHS access badge, checks and thousands in cash were among the items stolen with ...

item.title: Watch: 'Our father has died' - World mourns for Pope Francis
item.description: From mourners outside the Vatican to world leaders, tributes poured for Pope Francis who died aged 88.

item.title: Final days of Pope who joined Vatican crowds at Easter despite doctors' advice
item.description: Francis did what he had always done, receiving visitors and meeting people from every walk of life.

item.title: Secondhand stores are poised to benefit if US tariffs drive up new clothing costs
Attempts to reach ceasefire in Ukraine littered with years of failure
item.description: The 30-hour "Easter truce" and the reported violations underscore the difficulty in securing even a brief pause in fighting.

item.title: Trump backs defence secretary after reports of second Signal chat leak
item.description: The private messaging group included the US defence secretary's wife, brother and personal lawyer, sources tell US media.

item.title: Inside Greenland: residents say they're not for sale, but they are open for business
item.description: President Trump's still talking about buying Greenland, declining to rule out force to acquire the world's largest island. Greenlanders say they're no...

item.title: Savannah Bananas pack stadiums with their zany twist on baseball | 60 Minutes
item.description: Savannah Bananas owner Jesse Cole dreamed of making baseball livelier and more fun. Now the team is taking its dances, acrobatics, and trick plays to ...
